## hpr1394 :: Setting Up Your Own Blog

 Keith Murray talks about the things you need to consider when setting up your own blog. Topics discussed include hosting options, software platforms and a brief discussion of some of the underlying technologies involved.
Links to many of the topics and projects discussed are included below.
Links
Project Pages

Apache: https://httpd.apache.org/
nginx: https://wiki.nginx.org/Main
Wordpress: https://wordpress.org/
Joomla: https://www.joomla.org/
Drupal: https://drupal.org/
Jekyll: https://jekyllrb.com/
Second Crack: https://www.marco.org/secondcrack
Markdown: https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/

Installation Guides

Wordpress: https://codex.wordpress.org/Installing_WordPress
Drupal: https://drupal.org/documentation/install
Joomla: https://docs.joomla.org/J3.2:Installing_Joomla

Wikipedia Links

Blog: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blog
Virtual Private Server: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virtual_private_server
Plain Text: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plain_text
